main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before scheduling testing, confirm the provider’s credentials, what the evaluation includes, what deliverables you will receive, and typical turnaround times.

Methodology

How %%BRAND_NAME%% builds neuro evaluation pages

We publish decision frameworks, checklists, and educational guidance. We do not rank, recommend, or endorse providers.

What we do

  • Frameworks: checklists for readiness, documentation, and comparing evaluation options.
  • Guides: what testing typically involves, what questions to ask, and how to verify credentials.
  • FAQ answers: short explanations intended to reduce confusion — not replace clinical advice.

What we do not do

  • No “best/top” rankings.
  • No endorsements or referral fees.
  • No lead selling.

Advertising disclosure

Advertising placements are labeled “Advertising” and visually separated from editorial content. Advertising does not control what we publish.

%%AD:global_methodology_bottom%%

Why this matters: clear scope and deliverables reduce re-testing, delays, and avoidable costs.
